subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Justine Henin won her second tournament of the year, beating Karin Knapp of Italy, 6-3, 6-3, at the Diamond Games in Antwerp, Belgium. The top-ranked Henin rarely produced sparkling tennis during a week in which she did not play a seeded player, but her experience seemed to help carry her as she won her home tournament in front of 13,600 fans at the Sports Palace.
